channel.title: Good Client for Source
channel.description:
What's a client that I can use for Project Czar Source? I've tried Mopar, and it made me have a whole bunch of bugs.
If anyone knows a client that I can run my server on, please post link below. I'd really appreciate it. Also, please don't just post a random link to a client, if you are going to post a link or what client I should use, please make sure: *You tested it OR someone else tested it for Project Czar
Thanks, !.::Urban.::!

item.title: Good Client for Source
item.dc:creator: @Photoshopp Photoshopp
item.description:
@Photoshopp wrote:

Look under the Server Download Section there is Plenty of Open Clients, just keep trying them!

Read full topic
